name: Wizard Tower
description: A locale steeped in arcane or spiritual power; adventurers may study spells, brew potions, or face eldritch hazards.
atmosphere: The tower has a mysterious, arcane atmosphere with the scent of exotic spell components and the crackle of magical energy and the sound of magical experiments echoing through the ancient stone walls. The air carries the weight of accumulated magical knowledge and the essential nature of arcane research, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of supernatural power and the constant threat of magical mishaps and eldritch dangers lurking within the tower's depths.
